import React, { useState, useEffect, Component } from 'react' import * as S from './styles' import Header from '../../components/Header' import Collapsible from 'react-collapsible' import Footer from '../../components/Footer' import nextIcon from '../../assets/next.png' import api from '../../services/api' function CompanyCreate(){ const [typeCompany, setTypeCompany] = useState('private') const [typeAccount, setTypeAccount] = useState('private') const [bank, setBank] = useState([]) const [bankId, setBankId] = useState() const [accountData, setAccountData] = useState({ "type": `teste2`, "document": ``, "name": ``, "email": ``, "address": { "street": `teste`, "number": `teste4`, "complement": ``, "neighborhood": ``, "state": ``, "city": ``, "postalCode": `` }, "bankAccount": { "type": `teste3`, "bank": ``, "agency": ``, "account": ``, "accountDigit": ``, } } ) useEffect(()=>{ loadBanks() },[]) async function loadBanks() { await api.get(`/bank`) .then(response => { setBank(response.data) }) .catch(error =>{ console.log(error) }) } function handleSelectedCompany(event){ setTypeCompany(event.target.value) } function handleSelectedBank(event){ setBankId(event.target.value) } function handleSelectedAccount(event){ setTypeAccount(event.target.value) } async function submitAccount(){ await api.post("/company", accountData) } return(

{/* onChange={e => {setaccountData(street: )} */} { setAccountData({"bankAccount":{"type": `teste44`}}, console.log(accountData.bankAccount.bank)) }}>
) } export default CompanyCreate
